name: sellDom
short-description: A used pc parts selling website

details.option: Here in home page user will see category wise product.
To see product details user have to logged in and He can be seller/buyer in sign up page.
A buyer will only see orders, seller could be add product and only admin will see all buyers and sellers.
This is a photography service website that offers different kind photography of sports.
Here user can give review but before review they have to log in.
Admin can add a new service, user can review and every can see that reviews.
In home page there only a banner but in navbar there will course route.
